Message:
There exists a legend
in my village.

Long ago, there was a cult
that worshipped a witch,
and a small group of people
who fled from their clutches.

It is said that those people
created this village.

“There are still
lurkers out there,
chasing after witches.

If those scary people
find you outside all alone,
they’ll snatch you up
and drag you away.”

My grandmother,
the village chief,
would give that warning
to the children on
almost a daily basis...
Only a few people believed her.

Everyone else ran away
to the world outside.

But, I was so scared,
I didn’t have
the courage to leave,

so I secluded myself in
the safety of my room.

It’s lonely spending
day after day just
seeing everyone off
as they leave the nest,

but feeling lonely will always
be better than feeling afraid.

That was my world,
but then Rean came along,
and changed it.
